Package controller

Class MovieGoerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.DatabaseController
      • controller.MovieGoerController

  • public class MovieGoerController
extends DatabaseController
    A controller to perform storing and retrieval of Movie to/from database. Also validates changes before committing any changes to database.
    Since:
    2017-11-06
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Amos

    • Constructor Detail

      • MovieGoerController

        private MovieGoerController​()
        Creates a new MovieGoer Controller. Also initialize the list of moviegoers and read from database.

    • Method Detail

      • readDB

        protected void readDB​()
        Retrieve the moviegoers from database. The order is as follows: MovieGoer Name, Mobile Number, Password, Email, CustomerID, age These variables are parsed into the MovieGoer objects and stored when the MovieGoer Controller is initalized.
        Specified by:
        readDB in class DatabaseController

      • writeDB

        protected void writeDB​()
        Save the MovieGoer model into database. Each line in the moviegoer.dat file is a booking object. The order is as follows: MovieGoer Name, Mobile Number, Password, Email, CustomerID, age These will be appended into the moviegoers.dat file in sequence.
        Specified by:
        writeDB in class DatabaseController

      • addMovieGoer

        public boolean addMovieGoer​(java.lang.String password,
                            java.lang.String name,
                            java.lang.String mobileNumber,
                            java.lang.String email,
                            int age)
        Add a moviegoer into database. It will also checks if the moviegoer account already exists in the database by its email address.
        Parameters:
        password - Password of the moviegoer.
        name - Name of the moviegoer.
        mobileNumber - Mobile number of the moviegoer.
        email - Email address of the moviegoer.
        age - Age of the moviegoer.
        Returns:
        True if it successfully added. False otherwise.

      • getMovieGoerByEmail

        public MovieGoer getMovieGoerByEmail​(java.lang.String email)
        Get the MovieGoer object by its email address.
        Parameters:
        email - Email of the moviegoer.
        Returns:
        MovieGoer object it the account exists in database. null object otherwise.

      • validateCustomer

        public MovieGoer validateCustomer​(java.lang.String email,
                                  java.lang.String password)
        Validate the account credentials of a moviegoer.
        Parameters:
        email - Email of the moviegoer.
        password - Password of the moviegoer.
        Returns:
        MovieGoer object if the account exists and the credentials are correct. null object otherwise.

      • getInstance

        public static MovieGoerController getInstance​()
        Gets the channel reference of the MovieGoerController. Creates the channel reference if it do not exists.
        Returns:
        Instance of the MovieGoerController.

      • getMovieGoerList

        public java.util.ArrayList<MovieGoer> getMovieGoerList​()
        Gets the list of moviegoers from database.
        Returns:
        List of MovieGoers.
